archimate:ApplicationService.name: DKMS
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation: Decentralized Key Management System, an emerging standard for interoperable cryptographic key management based on DIDs. In Sovrin Infrastructure, the DKMS standard applies to Wallets and Agents.
